params.name: text_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize AlignTextConfig.

params.name: vision_config
params.description: Dictionary of configuration options used to initialize AlignVisionConfig.

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimensionality of text and vision projection layers.

params.name: temperature_init_value
params.description: The initial value of the temperature parameter. Default is used as per the original ALIGN implementation.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.
